title: Chapter 536
body:
Chapter 536

536 Three moves?

“What’s the hurry? I haven’t received my reward yet!”

...

Lu Ming said indifferently. He then looked at the old man at the counter.

The old man took out a storage ring and handed it to Lu Ming. here are 880000 Supreme spiritual crystals. Count them.

“There’s no need to light it!”

Lu Ming smiled. His storage ring flashed and all the best-grade spirit crystals were transferred into his storage ring.

Lu Ming then returned the storage ring to the elder.

“Hehe, now that I’ve received the reward, I’ll have to spit it out later, right?”

Shengchuan sneered.

“Oh, really? Don’t cry Later.”

Lu Ming pursed his lips.

Then, Lu Ming stepped forward and walked towards the divine guards ‘fighting ring.

In all the sub-palaces of the Empyrean heaven divine Palace, there was a Divine Guard battle platform.

“Let’s go and take a look!”

The people in the mission Palace Hall swarmed towards the divine guards battle stage.

There were five to six hundred people.

Some of them had even used voice transmission talismans to ask their friends and family to go to the divine guards ‘battle platform to watch.

Five or six hundred people walking together on the street naturally caused a sensation. Many people were curious and asked around. After hearing the whole story, they also followed the crowd to the divine Guard battle stage.

The number of people in the crowd increased rapidly, and soon, there were several thousand people.

Lu Ming walked to the front of the crowd. When he arrived at the divine guards ‘battle platform, he was a little stunned because he realized that the divine guards’ battle platform was surrounded by people.

It seemed that some people had received the news and rushed to the divine Guard battle platform first.

“So many young experts of the Sheng family have come!”

“Yeah? It’s no wonder. Not many people dare to offend the Sheng family. It’s normal for the geniuses of the Sheng family to come out and take a look.”

I hope that Lu Ming can withstand a few more moves. I hope he won’t die so easily. I’ve run so far for nothing.

“Not bad!”

A series of whispers sounded in the surroundings.

The smile on Lu Ming’s face grew wider.

Buzzzzzz!

Arriving at the edge of the divine guards ‘fighting ring, shengchuan stepped forward and crossed a distance of more than a hundred meters. He jumped onto the fighting ring and looked down at Lu Ming.”Lu Ming, hurry up and come up!”

Lu Ming smiled and walked up the stairs of the divine guards battle platform step by step.

He came to the divine Guard battle platform and stood opposite the holy river.

“Hahaha, Lu Ming, I didn’t expect that you would really dare to accept my challenge. I really don’t know where you got your guts from. Three moves. I’ll defeat you in three moves.”

Shengchuan’s smile was full of disdain.

“Three moves? Shengchuan, you have the nerve to say that. If it were me, I would have defeated him in two moves!”

no, one move is enough. I’ll beat him into a pig’s head with one move. Shengchuan, if you really defeat him with three moves, it’ll be too embarrassing.

shengchuan, this kid is so arrogant. I heard that he has repeatedly challenged the authority of the Sheng family. Today, you must cripple him and let him know the consequences of offending the Sheng family!

“That’s right, cripple him!”

At the edge of the fighting ring, some young geniuses from the Sheng family shouted one after another. Their voices were full of indifference and arrogance as if Lu Ming was a pitiful worm that could be manipulated at will.

The smile on shengchuan’s face grew wider. He looked at Lu Ming with contempt and said, ” “Lu Ming, did you hear that? This is the consequence of offending the Sheng family.”

“The next stage? Just relying on the mouths of your Sheng family?”

Lu Ming smiled faintly.

“Hmph, you’ll be crying later.”

Shengchuan’s eyes were cold.

how about this? it’s boring to fight directly. Let’s make a bet.

Lu Ming suddenly said.

He still remembered that last time he had a gambling match with Xue Chao, he had made a huge profit, so he naturally didn’t want to let go of this opportunity.

“Bet? What do you want to bet on?”

Shengchuan’s eyes lit up.

let’s bet on intent crystals, twenty. If I lose, I’ll give you twenty earth-type intent crystals. If you lose, you’ll give me twenty wind-type intent crystals. How about it? ”

Lu Ming said with a smile.

“Earth element intent crystal? You have one?”

Shengchuan’s eyes lit up. He had comprehended the creation of Earth.

Lu Ming smiled. With a wave of his hand, twenty pieces of earth-type profound meaning crystals appeared in the air. They exuded a strong concept of earth.

He had obtained these earth-attribute profound meaning crystals with han man and the rest from the scaled Demon tribe in the demonic scales dimension. Lu Ming also had a mid-grade earth-attribute profound meaning crystal.

After han man and the others were killed by Lu Ming, the profound meaning crystals naturally fell into Lu Ming’s pocket.

“It really is an earth element intent crystal.”

Shengchuan’s eyes glowed.

“Where’s your wind-type intent crystal? Take it out!”

Lu Ming said.

“Hmph, Lu Ming, are you afraid that I’ll go back on my word?”

Shengchuan snorted.

“I’m just afraid you’ll go back on your word.”

Lu Ming said.

“You …”

Sheng Chuan gritted his teeth, but he didn’t have that many wind intent crystals.

shengchuan, I have a few wind-attribute intent crystals. I’ll lend them to you first!

“I also have a few pieces here!”

The young men from the Sheng family on the side chimed in and took out a few wind-element intent crystals.

Shengchuan was overjoyed. He received them one by one and said loudly, ” brothers, I’ll borrow these intent crystals first. I’ll return them to you in a while.

From his tone, it seemed like he was about to win.

“En, quickly cripple that brat. I still have to go back and cultivate!”

The other young men of the Sheng family said.

“Don’t worry, it’ll be quick!”

Shengchuan took the ultimacy crystal and returned to Lu Ming. twenty intent crystals, not a single one less!

Lu Ming’s eyes lit up. Now, what he desired the most was the wind-type ultimacy crystal.

“But, twenty is a little too little!”

Lu Ming’s eyes turned to the young men of the Sheng family. His eyes suddenly lit up as if he had thought of something.

BOOM!

At this moment, Sheng Chuan put away the wind intent crystal, and a powerful aura burst out of his body.

The aura of the middle Lv 5 martial King realm.

“Lu Ming, just lose!”

Shengchuan shouted.

BOOM!

He threw a punch and a huge mountain peak appeared in the sky. It was a few thousand feet tall and it came crashing down on Lu Ming.

It was extremely majestic. Lu Ming’s body was extremely small compared to the mountain.

“Is this the first level lower tier of the creation of Earth? It’s so powerful!”

Many low-tier King tiers and even martial artists below the king tier exclaimed in shock.

“Break!”

Lu Ming let out a long howl and a Spear’s gleam shot up into the sky, colliding with the mountain.

BOOM!

The spear radiance collided with the mountain, creating a series of rumbling sounds. It lasted for a while before it exploded.

The mountain exploded, and the spear radiance also collapsed and disappeared.

Bang! Bang!

Shengchuan and Lu Ming retreated seven to eight steps.

The difference was that there was a strange smile on Lu Ming’s lips, while Sheng Chuan’s expression changed drastically.

“Detestable!”

Shengchuan roared in rage. He was actually forced to retreat by Lu Ming. It was a great humiliation.

they’re evenly matched. They’re actually evenly matched. Lu Ming can actually withstand a move from shengchuan. Unbelievable!

it’s indeed incredible. I didn’t expect Lu Ming’s combat strength to be so strong. No wonder he dared to fight the holy river.

Exclamations came from the surroundings.
